description.overview: Circle represents your friendships, community connections, and ease of social interaction and belonging.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Venus and Mercury transits to your natal Venus, Mercury, and 11th house (friendships, community, social networks). Venus brings social harmony, likability, and ease of connection. Mercury governs communication in friendships and group settings. When these planets form supportive aspects, friendships feel easy, you enjoy socializing, and community feels welcoming. Challenging aspects create social awkwardness, friendship friction, or feeling like an outsider.

primary_planets.venus: Social harmony, likability, ease of friendship and connection
primary_planets.mercury: Communication in friendships, group discussions, social wit

secondary_planets.jupiter: Expands social circle and community opportunities

key_houses.11: Friendships, community, social networks, group belonging

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum social impact - intense connection or social drama
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension in friendships or feeling outside community
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - social ease and natural belonging
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - friendship challenges or social awkwardness
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for social connection

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Social and community-focused - talk about friendships, belonging, social energy
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize reaching out to friends, accepting social invitations, enjoying community
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Normalize introvert needs, solo time is healthy, quality over quantity in friendships
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge social awkwardness or friendship friction as real - offer strategies without shaming

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Social energy is high today - reach out to friends, say yes to invitations, and enjoy feeling connected to your community.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Socializing takes effort today but connection is possible - be selective about who you spend energy on.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Social energy is low or friendships feel fraught today - honor your need for solitude and don't force connection you don't feel.
